import './charList.scss'; import abyss from '../../resources/img/abyss.jpg'; import { Component } from 'react'; import MarvelService from '../../services/MarvelService'; class CharList extends Component { state = { name: '', src: '' } marvelService = new MarvelService(); updateCharacter = (character) => { this.setState({ }) } updateCharList = () => { const id = Math.floor(Math.random() * (1011400 - 1011000) + 1011000); this.marvelService .getAllCharacters(id) .then(this.onCharLoaded) .catch(this.onError) } render() { const { name } = this.state return (
  • {name}
  • Abyss
  • Abyss
  • Abyss
  • Abyss
  • Abyss
  • Abyss
  • Abyss
  • Abyss
) } } export default CharList;
